nodes.text: Camren was a male Nautolan major of the Galactic Republic who was stationed on Belsavis during the Galactic War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. After Imperials wiped out his unit during the Invasion of Belsavis around 3641 BBY, he became furious at them and was unfit for active duty. When the the Imperials had commandeered a power station, Camren was determined to see it destroyed and enlisted a Republic citizen to get the job done.
